item.title: Things I Self-Hosting ðŸ–³
item.description: Disclaimer: This blog is not in any way promoting piracy. This is small new year blog about things I self-host to make my life easier, I have a previous blog here about my media server setup. So the same system I am using for self-hosting some applications which are helpful for me in my day-to-day life, basically I have turned my childhood PC to a local server, it’s been 13 years since its first boot, this mighty machine working for me without any complaints.
